title: Chocolate Cake
description: A rich and moist homemade chocolate cake that's perfect for birthdays or special occasions.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour two 9-inch round cake pans.
In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
Add milk, oil, eggs, and vanilla. Beat with an electric mixer on medium speed for 2 minutes until smooth.
Carefully stir in boiling water until fully combined. The batter will be thin, but that’s normal.
Divide batter evenly into prepared pans.
Bake for 30–35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
Cool in pans for 10 minutes, then transfer cakes to a wire rack to cool completely before frosting or serving.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
steps: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
In a skillet, cook pancetta until crispy, then add garlic and sauté briefly.
In a bowl, whisk eggs with Parmesan cheese and black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving 1/2 cup pasta water.
Quickly toss pasta with pancetta and remove from heat.
Stir in egg and cheese mixture, adding reserved pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and black pepper.

title: Caesar Salad
description: A fresh salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and creamy Caesar dressing.
steps: Wash and chop romaine lettuce.
In a large bowl, toss lettuce with Caesar dressing until well coated.
Add croutons and Parmesan cheese and mix gently.
Serve chilled with lemon wedges on the side.

title: Chicken Curry
description: A flavorful Indian chicken curry cooked with aromatic spices and a rich tomato gravy.
steps: Heat oil in a large pan and sauté onions until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 1 minute.
Stir in curry powder, turmeric, and chili powder.
Add chicken and cook until browned on all sides.
Mix in pureed tomatoes and yogurt, then simmer for 20 minutes until chicken is cooked through.
Season with salt and garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.

title: Pancakes
description: Fluffy homemade pancakes perfect for a weekend breakfast.
steps: In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar.
Whisk in milk, egg, and melted butter until smooth.
Heat a lightly oiled griddle over medium-high heat.
Pour batter onto griddle, using 1/4 cup for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form and edges are dry, then flip and cook until golden brown.

title: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
steps: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Spread tomato sauce over rolled-out dough.
Top with mozzarella slices and basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt.
Bake for 12-15 minutes or until crust is golden and cheese is bubbling.

title: Beef Stir Fry
description: Quick and easy beef stir fry with vegetables and soy sauce.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots)
steps: Mix beef with cornstarch and set aside.
Heat oil in a wok and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add beef and cook until browned.
Add vegetables and stir fry for 3-4 minutes.
Add soy sauce and oyster sauce, toss to coat, and cook for another 2 minutes.

title: Vegetable Soup
description: Healthy and comforting vegetable soup made with seasonal vegetables.
steps: Heat olive oil in a large pot, sauté onions, carrots, and celery until soft.
Add zucchini and green beans, cook for 2 minutes.
Pour in vegetable broth, bring to a boil, then simmer for 20 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

title: Tacos
description: Delicious Mexican tacos with seasoned beef, fresh vegetables, and cheese.
ingredients: Sour cream and salsa for serving
steps: Cook ground beef in a skillet until browned. Drain excess fat.
Add taco seasoning and a little water, simmer 5 minutes.
Warm tortillas on a dry skillet.
Fill tortillas with beef, lettuce, tomato, and cheese.
Serve with sour cream and salsa.

title: Grilled Salmon
description: Perfectly grilled salmon fillets with lemon and herbs.
steps: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Brush salmon with olive oil and season with salt, pepper, and garlic.
Place salmon on the grill, skin-side down, cook 4-5 minutes per side.
Garnish with lemon slices and fresh dill before serving.

title: Banana Bread
description: Moist and sweet banana bread made from ripe bananas.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a loaf pan.
Mix mashed bananas with melted butter.
Stir in sugar, egg, and vanilla.
Add baking soda, salt, and flour, mix until combined.
Pour batter into loaf pan and bake 60 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.

title: Shrimp Fried Rice
description: Quick and tasty shrimp fried rice with vegetables and soy sauce.
steps: Heat oil in a skillet, cook shrimp until pink, remove and set aside.
Scramble eggs in the same skillet.
Add rice and vegetables, stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Add shrimp back, pour soy sauce, toss to combine.
Garnish with green onions and serve.

title: Greek Salad
description: Refreshing salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese.
steps: Combine cucumbers, tomatoes, red onion, feta, and olives in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and red wine vinegar.
Season with salt and pepper, toss gently.
Serve chilled.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Classic cookies loaded with chocolate chips, chewy on the inside and crisp on the edges.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Cream butter and sugars until smooth.
Add eggs and vanilla, mix well.
Combine flour, baking soda, and salt, gradually add to the wet mixture.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop by spoonfuls onto baking sheets and bake 10-12 minutes.

title: Tomato Soup
description: Smooth and creamy tomato soup, perfect with grilled cheese.
steps: Heat olive oil, sauté onion and garlic until soft.
Add tomatoes and vegetable broth, bring to boil.
Simmer 20 minutes, then blend until smooth.
Stir in cream, season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with fresh basil and serve.

title: BBQ Ribs
description: Tender and juicy BBQ pork ribs with homemade sauce.
steps: Preheat oven to 300°F (150°C).
Season ribs with salt and pepper.
Brush with olive oil and cover with foil, bake for 2 hours.
Remove foil, brush with BBQ sauce, bake another 30 minutes.
Serve hot with extra BBQ sauce.

title: Pad Thai
description: Classic Thai stir-fried noodles with shrimp, tofu, and peanuts.
steps: Cook noodles according to package instructions.
Heat oil, sauté garlic, tofu, and shrimp until cooked.
Push ingredients to the side, scramble eggs.
Add noodles, fish sauce, tamarind, and sugar, toss to combine.
Garnish with peanuts and green onions before serving.

title: Lemon Drizzle Cake
description: Zesty and moist lemon cake with a sweet lemon glaze.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Cream butter and sugar, add eggs one at a time.
Mix in flour, baking powder, and salt.
Stir in milk and lemon zest.
Pour into greased loaf pan, bake 40-45 minutes.
Mix powdered sugar with lemon juice for glaze and drizzle over cooled cake.
